content: I got a remark error on two recent PRs (one my own, one that I r+'d). What's up with that? Locally remark runs just fine.
Looking into the workflow in question, the remark step was successful. However, the finishing step failed for some reason.
Apparently github actions have a "partial outage". This may be related.

Yeah, probably related to the outage.
I've had trouble completing gha jobs since yesterday at some point, jobs were simply not finishing and being cancelled after 6 hours :/
Now it seems to mostly work, but bors seems to have problems pushing to master.
Ah, disregard that, at least one of the PRs I r+'d went through now.
Or did it? It closed the issue, but the PR is still not marked as merged!?
Well, apparently it was merged to master. I just pulled and it shows up in the log. Github UI seems to be acting strangely lately.
Hm, I'd wish that GitHub is working on fixing the desync, but it's not so clear what's happening
Agreed. We're closing the PRs manually after checking that they're merged correctly.
